Explanations about Options.-Q(M):
Set Quality of Service -related bits in ICMP datagrams. tos can be decimal (ping
 only) or hex number.
Explanations about Options.-c(M):
Stop after sending count ECHO_REQUEST packets. With deadline option, ping waits for
 count ECHO_REPLY packets, until the timeout expires.
Explanations about Options.-q(M):
Quiet output. Nothing is displayed except the summary lines at startup time and when
 finished.
Explanations about Options.-t(M): ping only. Set the IP Time to Live.

Answers.MP Summary: send ICMP ECHO_REQUEST to network hosts
Top-3 Scripts:
ul_133931: if ! ping -Q 1 -c 1 -t 1 google.com; then
    ifdown eth0
    sleep 3
    ifup eth0
fi
